sentence.Network_en: La mia passione, sempre, dalla prima volta che ho toccato un pallone.
sentence.Network_cn: 从我初次碰到球的那一刻起, 足球便注定成为我永远的爱.

list.abs: il mio cuore e un gran pallone ., 我的心是一个大球.

means.word_mean: 1. an Italian game similar to tennis

auth_sentence.content: Democratic Congressman Frank Pallone of New Jersey had high praise for Mr. Obama's economic proposals.
auth_sentence.res_content: Democratic Congressman Frank Pallone of New Jersey had high praise for Mr. Obama's economic proposals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Democratic Congressman Frank Pallone of New Jersey had high praise for Mr. Obama's economic proposals.

auth_sentence.content: And the gentleman from New Jersey, Mr. Pallone, is recognized to lead the House in the Pledge of Allegiance.
auth_sentence.res_content: And the gentleman from New Jersey, Mr. Pallone, is recognized to lead the House in the Pledge of Allegiance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: And the gentleman from New Jersey, Mr. Pallone, is recognized to lead the House in the Pledge of Allegiance.
